Achieve real accountability Connect company, team and individual objectives; make progress and issues visible and actionable for everyone. Amplify your strategy, performance, and people “I couldn't run my business without WorkBoard. We would be so much slower, and I would never have the data I need to navigate all the changes outside or drive the changes we need inside.” Tina Murphy President & CEO , GHX Read this story “We chose WorkBoardAI to drive strategy execution in a faster-changing world. Its AI will help us improve strategic clarity, focus, operational rigor and coaching as we deliver on our vision.” Peter Ter Kulve CEO , Magnum Ice Cream Read this story OUR RESOURCES Customer Favorites View All Resources GUIDE Using OKRs to Improve Enterprise Performance GUIDE Learn how OKRs help enterprises adapt to change, create radical clarity on priorities, and drive agile, aligned strategy execution at scale. Using OKRs to Improve Enterprise Performance SOUND BITE Internal Friction Can Be Fierce SOUND BITE The recurring theme in my CEO conversations so far this year is SPEED. Some say at the pace of change, some say at the pace of China; few believe they're executing or iterating on strategic ambitions fast enough. The cause is often internal ... and it's addressable. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex, and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their operations and make data-driven decisions. I came across WorkBoard and was impressed with the work you're doing in strategy execution and OKR management. I think our solution could complement your existing infrastructure.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, thanks for reaching out, Alex. I'm John, the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve our operations, but I have to say, we've already got a pretty robust system in place with WorkBoard. What makes DeepData AI unique, and how do you think it could add value to our existing setup?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question, John. Our AI-powered data processing engine can handle large volumes of data in real-time, providing actionable insights that can inform your strategic decisions. We've seen significant ROI for our clients in terms of increased efficiency and reduced costs. I'd love to schedule a demo to show you how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I'm not sure if now is the right time. We're in the middle of our quarterly planning, and our team is already stretched thin. Can you tell me more about the implementation process and how it would impact our current workflows?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely, John. Our implementation process is designed to be seamless, with minimal disruption to your existing operations. We provide a dedicated support team to ensure a smooth onboarding process, and our solution can integrate with your current systems, including WorkBoard. As for the timeline, we can typically get up and running within 6-8 weeks.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds promising, but I have to consider the cost. We've already made significant investments in our current infrastructure, and I'm not sure if our budget can accommodate another large expenditure. Can you tell me more about your pricing model and what we can expect in terms of ROI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is tiered, based on the size of the organization and the scope of the implementation. For a company of your size, we're looking at around $50,000 per year, with a potential ROI of 3-5 times that amount within the first two years. I understand that it's a significant investment, but I believe the long-term benefits would far outweigh the costs.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate your honesty, Alex, but unfortunately, the price is just too high for us to consider at this time. We've got other priorities that we need to address, and while I think DeepData AI could be a valuable addition to our toolkit, it's not something we can justify at this price point. I appreciate the conversation, but I think we'll have to pass on this opportunity.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should have been more prepared to address the buyer's concerns about cost and ROI, potentially offering more flexible pricing options or a pilot project to demonstrate the value of DeepData AI. Sentiment: Neutral
